unnormalised: **Energy & Utilities: Solar Rooftop Subsidies Spark Interest Ahead of Diwali**
normalised: **Energy and Utilities: Solar Rooftop Subsidies Spark Interest Ahead of Diwali**

unnormalised: Good news for all you Chennai homeowners thinking of going solar! The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy (MNRE) is still offering juicy subsidies on rooftop solar installations. Imagine, powering your entire home with sunshine and saving money - just in time for Diwali lights!
normalised: Good news for all you Chennai homeowners thinking of going solar! The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy (M N R E) is still offering juicy subsidies on rooftop solar installations. Imagine, powering your entire home with sunshine and saving money, just in time for Diwali lights!

unnormalised: Word on the street is that folks in Kochi and Bangalore are also snapping these up faster than hot biryani at a wedding. The subsidy, depending on your state and system size, can significantly reduce the initial investment. We're talking potential savings of several thousand Rupees!
normalised: Word on the street is that folks in Kochi and Bangalore are also snapping these up faster than hot biryani at a wedding. The subsidy, depending on your state and system size, can significantly reduce the initial investment. We are talking potential savings of several thousand Rupees!

unnormalised: Think about it: no more hefty electricity bills during the festive season when everyone's using extra power. Plus, you're contributing to a greener India. Check with your local discom, like TANGEDCO, for specific details and eligibility criteria. Don't wait too long, these subsidies are often first-come, first-served! And imagine the savings - maybe enough to afford extra mithai this Diwali! Get your solar panels installed and enjoy a brighter, cheaper, and eco-friendly festive season.
